website_summaries.verdict: This table-top steamer has an oversized tank that lets you steam for 45 minutes straight.
pros: Table top device with one-touch operation
Ozone system with negatively-charged ionic system provides intense moisturizing and hydration
Large 320-milliliter water tank supports 45 minutes of direct steaming
cons: May not full cover from forehead to back of neck

product_meta.title: Nova Microdermabrasion Portable 3 In 1 Hair and Facial Steamer W/Bonnet Hood for Personal Home Use, Mini Table TOP SPA Steamer Machine with Cap, Hot Mist Beauty Equipment
feature_bullets: 【Pro Personal Face Steamer】Features serve sterilizing function can effectively supply moisture for skin,accelerate skin microcirculation,promote blood circulation. Ultra-fine mist opens and unclogs facial pores to remove dirt, oil and grime,improving nutrient absorption for skin.

【Exquisite Hair Care】Built-in UV System,negatively charged oxygen,powerful hot mist can moisturize and hydrate hair,preventing hair breakage and split ends. Also it can improve the absorption of conditioners and other treatments,reducing hair dandruff.

【Multifunctional Steamer】Not only good for skin & hair care, but also can humidity room and warm towels for ultimate refreshment.Larger 320ml water tank allows for 45 minutes of working time with a silent operation, long runing time.

【Safe Design】Smart shut off design, it will stop automatically if there is no water in the tank, no need to worry about either excessive hot water will spill causing injury or too little water damages the unit.

【Easy to Use】 One-press for easy operating. Compact Table Top Design, portable and free your hands. Easily transform a hair steamer into a facial beauty steamer by changing the spraying pole, just enjoy a spa experience at home without going to salon.
